biotools.summary: Calculate centrality indexes used for the identification of the most important nodes in a network. Suite of algorithms dedicated to network nodes centrality analysis, computing several centralities for undirected, directed and weighted networks. The results of the topological analysis can be integrated with data set from lab experiments, like expression or phosphorylation levels for each protein represented in the network.

bioschemas.name: CentiScaPe
